A wooden wall from Bubble Breeze Galaxy which uses path-controlled movement.

Uses path_arg1 and point_args 0 and 1. (Requires paths?)

PhantomDecoratePartsA.Notes: A set of decorative wall pieces from Ghostly Galaxy.

CaveInCube.Name: Collapsing Engine Parts Generator

MagmaMonsterSmallPlanetStepBigBurn.Name: Melty Monster -- Magmaw Planet Long Burned Asteroid
MagmaMonsterSmallPlanetStepBigBurn.Notes: The burned version of the long stone planet used at the end of the first mission of Melty Monster Galaxy.

GliderDownPillar.Name: Fleet Glide -- Large Collapsing Pillar
GliderDownPillar.Notes: A large collapsing pillar used in Fleet Glide Galaxy.

StarCreekWaterfallL.Name: Cosmic Cove -- Waterfall Splashes Effect [Duplicate]
StarCreekWaterfallL.Notes: A standalone duplicate of the waterfall splash effects seen on Cosmic Cove Galaxy's main planet.

Meramera.Name: Li'l Cinder
Meramera.Notes: A burning rock enemy that floats around and chases after Mario. It will burn the player upon contact. If attacked with a Fire Ball, it gets reignited.

FireBarSpherePlanet.Name: Fiery Flotilla -- Spherical Lava Planet
FireBarSpherePlanet.Notes: The spherical lava planet used in Bowser Jr.'s Fiery Flotilla.

GoroRockBreakFance.Name: Boulder Bowl -- Destroyable Fence
GoroRockBreakFance.Notes: A wooden fence that can be broken using the Rock power-up; used in Boulder Bowl Galaxy.

VsOtaRockTankIcePlanetIce.Name: Shiverburn -- Prince Pikante Planet Ice Layer
VsOtaRockTankIcePlanetIce.Notes: The ice layer used on the Prince Pikante planet in Shiverburn Galaxy.

ChoConveyorPlanetB.Name: Toy Time -- Blue Conveyor Belt
ChoConveyorPlanetB.Notes: The blue conveyor belt planet used in Toy Time Galaxy.

ChoConveyorPlanetA.Name: Toy Time -- Wall Bounce Dessert Planet
ChoConveyorPlanetA.Notes: The first set of cake planets used in the section where the player has to bounce off the walls with the Spring power-up in Toy Time Galaxy.

ChoConveyorPlanetD.Name: Toy Time -- Rotating Citrus Cake
ChoConveyorPlanetD.Notes: The rotating citrus cake planet in Toy Time Galaxy.

ChoConveyorPlanetC.Name: Toy Time -- Citrus Cake Slice
ChoConveyorPlanetC.Notes: The plate with a slice of a citrus cake in Toy Time Galaxy.

ElectricRailTwoPoint.Name: Back-and-Forth Electric Fence
ElectricRailTwoPoint.Notes: A fence made of electricity that moves back and forth between two points.

BigBubbleSwitchSphere.Name: Big Bubble Switch Area [Sphere]
BigBubbleSwitchSphere.Notes: An area that activates a switch once the player enters it while riding a Big Bubble.

HipDropMoveBlockHShape.Name: Puzzle Plank -- H-Shape Ground Pound Block
HipDropMoveBlockHShape.Notes: An H-shaped ground pound block used in Puzzle Plank Galaxy.

StaffRollDemoObj.Name: Credits Sequence Object Holder
StaffRollDemoObj.Notes: A holder that creates and registers several objects that appear during the credits sequence as well as the scrolling text.

CubeCameraCylinder.Name: Camera Area [Cylinder]
CubeCameraCylinder.Notes: An area that causes the camera to change when the player enters it.

KoopaJrCastleGate.Name: Fiery Flotilla -- Castle Gate
KoopaJrCastleGate.Notes: The large gate used in Bowser Jr.'s Fiery Flotilla.

PlayerSeSphere.Name: Player Falling Sound Area [Sphere]
PlayerSeSphere.Notes: Plays the "long fall" sound effect while the player is airborne inside this area.

SpaceCannonLauncher.Name: Decorative Enemy Cannon
SpaceCannonLauncher.Notes: A decorative cannon that is used as a base for things like Bullet Bill launchers.

BegomanBaby.Name: Topmini
BegomanBaby.Notes: A small yellow robot enemy that is always spinning.

DanceFlower.Name: Twirlip
DanceFlower.Notes: A flower-like enemy whose movement is defined by paths.

MorphItemCollectionFire.Name: Decorative Fire Flower
MorphItemCollectionFire.Notes: A Fire Flower used in the power-up display room of Starship Mario.

MiniPlanetAcrossPlanet.Name: Yoshi Star -- Grass Bonus Planet
MiniPlanetAcrossPlanet.Notes: An optional planet used in the second planet of Yoshi Star Galaxy.

KingTossin.Name: Rollodillo
KingTossin.Notes: The armadillo boss fought at the end of Boulder Bowl Galaxy's first mission.

ReverseGravity2DRoofActionPlanet.Name: Rightside Down -- Fire Flower Planet
ReverseGravity2DRoofActionPlanet.Notes: The planet where the Fire Flower is located in Rightside Down Galaxy.

SwitchingMoveWallJumpAreaBlockRed.Name: Flip-Out -- Final Section Red Walls
SwitchingMoveWallJumpAreaBlockRed.Notes: A set of red walls used in the final section of Flip-Out Galaxy's main planet.

ItemCollectionPlanetWall.Name: Starship Mario -- Power-Up Display Room Wall
ItemCollectionPlanetWall.Notes: A wall used for the power-up display room of Starship Mario.

WatchTowerRotateStep.Name: Honeyhive -- Giant Wood Windmill
WatchTowerRotateStep.Notes: A giant wood windmill with four platforms that move along with the rotating frame.

GlaringLightAreaCylinder.Name: Glaring Light Area [Cylinder]
GlaringLightAreaCylinder.Notes: A shining light area that kills Boos when they enter it.

LightFruit.Name: Bulb Berry
LightFruit.Notes: A berry that turns Yoshi into Bulb Yoshi who can make parts of the stage appear.

RepeatBlockLavaBoxPlanetProminence.Name: Lava Lair -- Snake Blocks Planet Rotating Fire Balls
RepeatBlockLavaBoxPlanetProminence.Notes: A set of rotating fire balls used on the snake blocks planet in Bowser's Lava Lair.

Butterfly.Name: Butterfly
Butterfly.Notes: A small decorative butterfly. May release Star Bits if touched.

Fountain.Name: Small Water Fountain
Fountain.Notes: A water fountain effect from Gusty Garden Galaxy. Flings the player upwards if they stand on it.

FreezeVolcanoMagma.Name: Shiverburn -- Flaming Volcano
FreezeVolcanoMagma.Notes: The flaming volcano used in Shiverburn Galaxy.

PlayerSeCylinder.Name: Player Falling Sound Area [Cylinder]
PlayerSeCylinder.Notes: Plays the "long fall" sound effect while the player is airborne inside this area.

PurpleRailCoin.Name: Purple Coin Line
PurpleRailCoin.Notes: An object that creates a line of Purple Coins.

SuperSpinDriverPink.Name: Pink Launch Star
SuperSpinDriverPink.Notes: A pink version of the Launch Star which appears after a Hungry Luma is fed.

BigBirikyu.Name: Big Amp
BigBirikyu.Notes: An electric ball-shaped enemy that moves on a set path.

InvisibleWall10x20.Name: Invisible Wall (Size: 10 x 20)
InvisibleWall10x20.Notes: An invisible wall of size 10 x 20.

KoopaJrKillerShipA.Name: Airship (Cannons)
KoopaJrKillerShipA.Notes: An airship with rows of cannons on the sides.

DemoAstroPlanet.Name: Comet Observatory for Cutscene
DemoAstroPlanet.Notes: A model of the Comet Observatory that appears during the ending cutscene. This standalone version of the object is unused.

AirBubbleGenerator.Name: Air Bubble Generator
AirBubbleGenerator.Notes: A nozzle that periodically generates air bubbles.

RotateFireBar2DRotateStepParts.Name: Gravity Gauntlet -- Rotating Platforms
RotateFireBar2DRotateStepParts.Notes: A set of four rotating platforms used on the large rotating wheel in Bowser's Gravity Gauntlet.

DrumActionPlanetB.Name: Sky Station -- Spiky Piranha Plant Planet
DrumActionPlanetB.Notes: The planet used at the end of the second mission of Sky Station Galaxy.

NoMessageArea.Name: Disable Messages Area
NoMessageArea.Notes: An area that prevents talking and reading of NPCs when entered.

MercatorCube.Name: Mercator Projection Area [Cube]
MercatorCube.Notes: A special area that projects compatible objects inside of it around the origin of the zone. The cube's origin is the base's center.

CandyLiftA.Name: Toy Time -- 4 Rotating Lollipops
CandyLiftA.Notes: A set of four rotating lollipops used in Toy Time Galaxy.

CandyLiftB.Name: Toy Time -- 2 Rotating Lollipops
CandyLiftB.Notes: A set of two rotating lollipops used in Toy Time Galaxy.

HeavySteeringArea.Name: Hard Turning Controls Area
HeavySteeringArea.Notes: An area that makes it harder to steer the player around.

MiniHoneyBeeExGalaxy.Name: Dome Warp: Honeyclimb
MiniHoneyBeeExGalaxy.Notes: A dome warp to Honeyclimb Galaxy.

LavaRotatePlanet.Name: Melty Molten: Rotating Planet
LavaRotatePlanet.Notes: The large rotating planet used in the third mission of Melty Molten Galaxy.

OmoteuLandSky.Name: Flipsville Sky
OmoteuLandSky.Notes: The cloudy sky model with multiple gravity-indicating arrows from Flipsville Galaxy.

ReverseGravity2DLiftPlanet.Name: Rightside Down -- Slide Planet
ReverseGravity2DLiftPlanet.Notes: The section with the long slide from Rightside Down Galaxy.

SandBird.Name: Sand Bird Controller
SandBird.Notes: Assembles several smaller parts to form the Sand Bird creature from Slipsand Galaxy.

InvisibleWall10x10.Name: Invisible Wall 10x10
InvisibleWall10x10.Notes: An invisible wall of the size 10 x 10.

GliderBalloon.Name: Balloon
GliderBalloon.Notes: A balloon that gives Star Bits when popped.

CannonFortressRotateBreakStepB.Name: Dreadnought -- Medium Collapsing Tower Planet Wheel
CannonFortressRotateBreakStepB.Notes: A rotating cylindrical platform that breaks off the tower planet in Dreadnought Galaxy.

PlantB.Name: Decorative Plant B
PlantB.Notes:
A more advanced flower spawner which uses ShapeModelNo for all the different plants. The following shape IDs are available:
0 Tulips
3 Lily of the Valley

BeeEater.Name: Bee Eater
BeeEater.Notes: A green plant with red spikes that will try to lunge at the player to damage them.

CannonFortressRotateBreakStepA.Name: Dreadnought -- Small Collapsing Tower Planet Wheel
CannonFortressRotateBreakStepA.Notes: A small rotating cylindrical platform that breaks off the tower planet in Dreadnought Galaxy.

DrillBullet.Name: Digga
DrillBullet.Notes: The yellow drill bullet enemy used in Spin-Dig Galaxy.

PlantA.Name: Decorative Plant A
PlantA.Notes:
A more advanced flower spawner which uses ShapeModelNo for all the different plants. The following shape IDs are available:
0 Violets
1 Short Bush
2 Mushrooms
3 Clover
4 Dead Bush
5 Red Flower
6 Bubbly Flower
7 Yellow Flower
8 Tall Bush

SkeletalFishBoss.Name: Kingfin (Boss)
SkeletalFishBoss.Notes: The skeletal fish boss of Bonefin Galaxy.

TicoShopDice.Name: Lumalee Shop [Dices]
TicoShopDice.Notes: A blue Luma that can transform on the spot into a 1-Up Chance Cube.

CannonFortressRotateBreakStepC.Name: Dreadnought -- Large Collapsing Tower Planet Wheel
CannonFortressRotateBreakStepC.Notes: A large rotating cylindrical platform that breaks off the tower planet in Dreadnought Galaxy.

LavaGeyser.Name: Lava Geyser
LavaGeyser.Notes: A lava geyser used in lava-themed galaxies.

PlantD.Name: Decorative Plant D
PlantD.Notes:
A more advanced flower spawner which uses ShapeModelNo for all the different plants. The following shape IDs are available:
1 Lily
2 Sunflower

PlantC.Name: Decorative Plant C
PlantC.Notes:
A more advanced flower spawner which uses ShapeModelNo for all the different plants. The following shape IDs are available:
0 Cosmos
1 Round Bush

BombBird.Name: Cluckboom
BombBird.Notes: A fat bird that drops bombs; used in Dusty Dune Galaxy and Slipsand Galaxy.

PeachCastleGardenPlanet.Name: Peach's Castle (Star Festival)
PeachCastleGardenPlanet.Notes: Peach's Castle, as seen during the night of the Star Festival (prologue) in SMG1.

DinoPackunVs2.Name: Fiery Dino Piranha
DinoPackunVs2.Notes: The boss fought in Melty Molten Galaxy and in Boss Blitz Galaxy.

DinoPackunVs1.Name: Dino Piranha [SMG2]
DinoPackunVs1.Notes: The SMG2 version of Dino Piranha fought at the Boss Blitz Galaxy.

ReverseGravity2DDossunPlanet.Name: Rightside Down -- Thwomps Planet
ReverseGravity2DDossunPlanet.Notes: The planet with the Thwomps used in Rightside Down Galaxy.

LuigiIntrusively.Name: Playable Luigi
LuigiIntrusively.Notes: Mario's younger brother who offers to play a level in Mario's place when talked to.

BarrelElectricRailMoveLift.Name: Space Storm -- Small Moving Platform
BarrelElectricRailMoveLift.Notes: A small moving platform from Space Storm Galaxy's long cylindrical satellite planet.

WhirlPoolAccelerator.Name: Whirlpool
WhirlPoolAccelerator.Notes: A whirlpool of configurable size that spins the player around upon contact underwater.

MeteorCannon.Name: Gateway Meteor
MeteorCannon.Notes: A small meteor used in Gateway Galaxy. This will cause a quake once it hits the floor.

MorphItemNeoTeresa.Name: Boo Mushroom
MorphItemNeoTeresa.Notes: A Boo Mushroom that transforms the player into a Boo character.

ChallengeBallMoveGroundA.Name: Rolling Gizmo -- Large Moving Block
ChallengeBallMoveGroundA.Notes: A large metal box that serves as a moving obstacle in Rolling Gizmo Galaxy.

ChallengeBallMoveGroundB.Name: Rolling Gizmo -- Small Moving Block
ChallengeBallMoveGroundB.Notes: A small metal box that serves as a moving obstacle in Rolling Gizmo Galaxy.

BarrelCloudActionPlanet.Name: Galaxy Generator -- Cloud Flower Planet
BarrelCloudActionPlanet.Notes: The planet from Bowser's Galaxy Generator's section that features Cloud Flowers and Bullet Bills.

ColorPencil.Name: Toy Time -- Colored Pencil
ColorPencil.Notes: A colored pencil used in Toy Time Galaxy.

TubeSliderDamageObj.Name: Slider Spiky Plant Group
TubeSliderDamageObj.Notes: A group of Spiky Plants that is used on the wooden slide in Tall Trunk Galaxy.

LavaHomeVolcanoFlow.Name: Melty Molten -- Volcano Eruption
LavaHomeVolcanoFlow.Notes: The volcano eruption effect used in Melty Molten Galaxy.

LavaTransparentPlanet.Name: Snow Cap: Transparent Planet
LavaTransparentPlanet.Notes: A transparent planet used in both Melty Molten Galaxy and Snow Cap Galaxy.

BattleShipExplosionMetal.Name: Metal Explosion Effect
BattleShipExplosionMetal.Notes: A metal explosion effect used in the second mission of Battlerock Galaxy.

ChildKameck.Name: Fire Ball Magikoopa [Child]
ChildKameck.Notes: A Fire Ball Magikoopa that is used for special ChildObj setups.

TimerCoinBlock.Name: Timed Coins ? Block
TimerCoinBlock.Notes: A ? Block that gives one Coin every time it is hit. Disappears after some hits and seconds.

KickStone.Name: Kickable Rock
KickStone.Notes: A small rock that will spawn either a Coin or a Star Bit when kicked.

BiriBiriBegomanSpikePistonA.Name: Battlerock -- Green Piston
BiriBiriBegomanSpikePistonA.Notes: A moving green piston used in Battlerock Galaxy.

MarioNoCapArea.Name: Hide Mario's Cap Area
MarioNoCapArea.Notes: An area that hides Mario's cap when entered.

StarrySky.Name: StarrySky
StarrySky.Notes: A colorful sky model featuring many stars.

GoroRockDashPlanetA.Name: Melty Monster -- Rock Mushroom Course First Section
GoroRockDashPlanetA.Notes: The first section of the Rock Mushroom course in Melty Monster Galaxy.

GoroRockDashPlanetB.Name: Melty Monster -- Rock Mushroom Course Final Section
GoroRockDashPlanetB.Notes: The final section of the Rock Mushroom course in Melty Monster Galaxy.

HeavensDoorHouseDoor.Name: Gateway House Door
HeavensDoorHouseDoor.Notes: A door from one of Gateway Galaxy's houses

PlaneCollisionArea.Name: Extended Item Sensor Area
PlaneCollisionArea.Notes: An area which extends the sensor range when trying to collect items along the camera's view direction. For example, this allows the player to collect an item while they stand behind or in front of it.

WanwanSearchBig.Name: Large Silver Chomp [Broken]
WanwanSearchBig.Notes: A large, more aggressive version of a Silver Chomp. Model files have been removed. Therefore, the object is useless.

StarPieceCluster.Name: Blue Star Bit Crystal
StarPieceCluster.Notes: A large blue crystal that is used on Launch Star paths. In SMG2, it breaks once the player touches it.

BeyondSandSky.Name: Slipsand Daytime Sky
BeyondSandSky.Notes: The daytime sky model from Slipsand Galaxy and Clockwork Ruins Galaxy that features several large towers.

MogucchiRefuseTerritory.Name: "MogucchiRefuseTerritory" [Useless]
MogucchiRefuseTerritory.Notes: A useless generic object that serves no actual purpose.

DashRingWallRightA.Name: Slimy Spring -- Right Moving Wall
DashRingWallRightA.Notes: A moving wall used in the Underwater Boo section of Slimy Spring Galaxy.

FallsCube.Name: Waterfall Effect Area [Cube]
FallsCube.Notes: An area that makes waterfall splash effects appear around the player. The cube's origin is the base's center.

LavaHomeVolcanoFallingRock.Name: Falling Rocks Effect (Alternate)
LavaHomeVolcanoFallingRock.Notes: An alternate version of the falling rocks effect; used in Melty Molten Galaxy.

BothSideLiftPlanet.Name: Flipsville -- Moving Platforms Planet
BothSideLiftPlanet.Notes: The planet used near the end of the first mission of Flipsville Galaxy.

DeadLeaves.Name: Autumn Leaves
DeadLeaves.Notes: A pile of brown leaves that spawn an item when using the Spin Attack on it.

WaterRoadCaveRotateGround.Name: Sand Spiral -- Rotating Stone Spiral Platform
WaterRoadCaveRotateGround.Notes: The large rotating stone spiral platform used at the end of Sand Spiral Galaxy.

CrossRingOpaquePlanet.Name: Toy Time -- Opaque Flipswitch Chain
CrossRingOpaquePlanet.Notes: The opaque part of the Flipswitch chain planet located in the Toy Time Galaxy.

WhiteOutPlanet.Name: Freezy Flake -- Blizzard Planet
WhiteOutPlanet.Notes: The blizzard planet from Freezy Flake Galaxy.

DustKoopaBrick.Name: Castle Blocks Debris
DustKoopaBrick.Notes: A set of castle blocks used as space debris.

BigBubbleMoveLimitterPlane.Name: Big Bubble Movement Limiter [Planar]
BigBubbleMoveLimitterPlane.Notes: Limits the movement of Big Bubbles so that it moves on an invisible plane.

ForceJumpPlanetA.Name: Airship Armada: Trampoline Planet
ForceJumpPlanetA.Notes: The small trampoline planet that appears in Bowser Jr.'s Airship Armada.

MagicBell.Name: Magic Bell
MagicBell.Notes:
A shiny bell that can be interacted with by touching it with the star pointer or directly with the player from up close.

SW_A: Activates upon first interaction. (Single use)

FlagKoopaCastle.Name: Blue Bowser Flag
FlagKoopaCastle.Notes: A blue flag with Bowser's symbol on it. Used in the background of Bowser's domains.

PictureJoinPlanetFinish.Name: Puzzle Plank -- Completed Mandibug Puzzle Planet
PictureJoinPlanetFinish.Notes: The completed version of the Mandibug puzzle used in Puzzle Plank Galaxy.

RailMoveNormalLift.Name: Flash Black -- Yellow Moving Platform
RailMoveNormalLift.Notes: A simple moving platform that is yellow.

TamakoroFlipPanelAppearStep.Name: Rolling Masterpiece -- Flipswitch Planet Ruler
TamakoroFlipPanelAppearStep.Notes: A large ruler platform used on the Flipswitch planet in Rolling Masterpiece Galaxy.

HoneyQueenLeafA.Name: Leaf Platform
HoneyQueenLeafA.Notes: A leaf platform used in Honeyhive Galaxy.

ChaosGravityStartPlanet.Name: Upside Dizzy -- Intro Planet
ChaosGravityStartPlanet.Notes: The house/mansion planet that the player lands on at the start of Upside Dizzy Galaxy. It lacks collision.

LavaProminenceEnvironment.Name: Lava Bubble Effect
LavaProminenceEnvironment.Notes: A standalone visual effect of a Lava Bubble (LavaProminence) for solely decorational purposes, without harming the player.

MiniHoneyBeeKingdomGalaxy.Name: Dome Warp: Honeyhive
MiniHoneyBeeKingdomGalaxy.Notes: A dome warp to Honeyhive Galaxy.

DashRingWallLeftA.Name: Slimy Spring -- Left Moving Wall
DashRingWallLeftA.Notes: A moving wall used in the Underwater Boo section of Slimy Spring Galaxy.

FlexibleSandPlanetPartsA.Name: Dusty Dune: Sand Tide Planet
FlexibleSandPlanetPartsA.Notes: The sand tide planet that appears in the Dusty Dune Galaxy.

OceanFloaterTowerRotateStepD.Name: Buoy Base: Rotating Platform D
OceanFloaterTowerRotateStepD.Notes: A rotating platform used in Buoy Base Galaxy.

Kanina.Name: Blue Crabber
Kanina.Notes: A blue crab enemy that runs away from the player. Drops a 1-Up when defeated.

OceanFloaterTowerRotateStepC.Name: Buoy Base: Rotating Platform C (Unfinished)
OceanFloaterTowerRotateStepC.Notes: An unused and unfinished rotating platform which was meant to be used in Buoy Base Galaxy.

OceanFloaterTowerRotateStepB.Name: Buoy Base: Rotating Platform B
OceanFloaterTowerRotateStepB.Notes: A rotating platform used in Buoy Base Galaxy.

RainCloud.Name: Rain Cloud
RainCloud.Notes: A rain cloud. Only Bee Mario can stand on these.

StinkBugParent.Name: Mandibug Stack
StinkBugParent.Notes: The miniboss fought at the end of the second mission of Honeyhive Galaxy and at the end of the first mission of Puzzle Plank Galaxy.

OceanFloaterTowerRotateStepA.Name: Buoy Base: Rotating Platform A
OceanFloaterTowerRotateStepA.Notes: A rotating platform used in Buoy Base Galaxy.

SkyIslandPartsA.Name: Cloudy Court -- Starting Planet
SkyIslandPartsA.Notes: The planet used at the start of Cloudy Court Galaxy.

TrapBaseA.Name: Tiny Gilded Metal Sphere
TrapBaseA.Notes: A tiny dark sphere of gilded metal used as a generic base for other objects such as Air Bubble generators, Bullet Bill launchers, flamethrowers, etc.

SkyIslandPartsE.Name: Cloudy Court -- Grass Planet with Ledge
SkyIslandPartsE.Notes: A grassy platform with a raised ledge used in Cloudy Court Galaxy.

FlowerHighlandPlanetA.Name: Honeybloom -- Starting Planet
FlowerHighlandPlanetA.Notes: The starting planet of Honeybloom Galaxy where the player can find a hidden Star.

SkyIslandPartsD.Name: Cloudy Court -- Checkpoint Planet
SkyIslandPartsD.Notes: The planet where a Checkpoint and the Hungry Luma are located in Cloudy Court Galaxy.

FlowerHighlandPlanetB.Name: Honeybloom -- Buzz Planet
FlowerHighlandPlanetB.Notes: The second planet of Honeybloom Galaxy where several Buzz can be found.

SkyIslandPartsC.Name: Cloudy Court -- Cylindrical Grass Planet
SkyIslandPartsC.Notes: A small grassy planet used in Cloudy Court Galaxy.

FlowerHighlandPlanetC.Name: Honeybloom -- Fuzzy Planet
FlowerHighlandPlanetC.Notes: The planet with the Fuzzies from Honeybloom Galaxy.

SkyIslandPartsB.Name: Cloudy Court -- Pedestal Platform
SkyIslandPartsB.Notes: A planet featuring a wood pedestal; used in Cloudy Court Galaxy.

FlowerHighlandPlanetD.Name: Honeybloom -- Bee Eater Planet
FlowerHighlandPlanetD.Notes: The long planet with the Bee Eater plants used at the end of Honeybloom Galaxy.

TubeSliderTicoCoin.Name: Slider Comet Medal
TubeSliderTicoCoin.Notes: A variant of the Comet Medal item that is intended to be used in slider sections.

BuildingBlocksDust.Name: Rightside Down -- Decorative Wood Blocks
BuildingBlocksDust.Notes: A set of decorative wooden blocks from Rightside Down Galaxy.

SkyIslandPartsF.Name: Cloudy Court -- Launch Star Platform
SkyIslandPartsF.Notes: A platform where a Launch Star is located in Cloudy Court Galaxy.

Petari.Name: Starbag
Petari.Notes: A green bag-like enemy that turns invisible and runs away from the player and drops twenty Star Bits once defeated.

BarrelElectricRailColonyPlanet.Name: Space Storm -- Long Cylindrical Satellite Planet
BarrelElectricRailColonyPlanet.Notes: The long cylindrical satellite planet from Space Storm Galaxy.

ChooChooTrain.Name: Toy Time -- Train
ChooChooTrain.Notes: A moving toy train located in Toy Time Galaxy.

ChallengeBallAccelCylinderA.Name: Rolling Gizmo -- Rotating Cylinder
ChallengeBallAccelCylinderA.Notes: A rotating red cylinder used in Rolling Gizmo Galaxy.

AquariumRailMoveObj.Name: Cosmic Cove -- Moving Gate
AquariumRailMoveObj.Notes: A moving metal gate from Cosmic Cove Galaxy.

CrystalSwitch.Name: Crystal Switch
CrystalSwitch.Notes: A Zelda-like crystal that can activate a switch when touched.

MagmaMonsterRotateSeasaw.Name: Melty Monster -- Rotating Lava Wheel
MagmaMonsterRotateSeasaw.Notes: A rotating wheel used on the second planet of the first mission of Melty Monster Galaxy.

WaterBazooka.Name: Bubbles Undergrunt Gunner
WaterBazooka.Notes: A water bubble-shooting Undergrunt Gunner that appears in Gold Leaf Galaxy and Deep Dark Galaxy.

Dreamer.Name: Tip Network
Dreamer.Notes: An digital billboard that shows the player how to perform basic actions.

SeaStormPlanet.Name: "Temporary High Model" Planet
SeaStormPlanet.Notes:
Yet another "Temporary High Model" object.
See: https://tcrf.net/Super_Mario_Galaxy/Unused_Models#Placeholder_Planets

WorldMap07Model.Name: World S Background Model
WorldMap07Model.Notes: The background model form World S.

DinoPackunBattleLv2Planet.Name: Melty Molten -- Fiery Dino Piranha Planet
DinoPackunBattleLv2Planet.Notes: The planet where Fiery Dino Piranha is fought in the Melty Molten and Boss Blitz Galaxies.

SoundEmitterCube.Name: Sound Emitter Area [Cube]
SoundEmitterCube.Notes: An area that starts playing a sound effect when entered. The cube's origin is the base's center.

Koopa.Name: Bowser [Lava Lair]
Koopa.Notes: The Bowser boss fought at the end of Bowser's Lava Lair.

WaterfallCaveNoBreakCover.Name: Beach Bowl -- Rock Wall
WaterfallCaveNoBreakCover.Notes: An unbreakable rock wall which covers the entrance to Beach Bowl Galaxy's underwater cave.

BirdLouseS.Name: Small Cloud Particles
BirdLouseS.Notes: A large cloud effect used in a few galaxies, such as Honeyhive Galaxy and Gold Leaf Galaxy.

TereboGroup.Name: Octoboo Group
TereboGroup.Notes: A group of Octoboos that move together.

MiniOceanRingGalaxy.Name: Dome Warp: Sea Slide
MiniOceanRingGalaxy.Notes: A dome warp to Sea Slide Galaxy.

SurprisedGalaxy.Name: Portal to Loopdeeloop Galaxy
SurprisedGalaxy.Notes: A green portal that opens Loopdeeloop Galaxy's Star select screen when touched during a Launch Star flight.

AstroMapBoard.Name: Comet Observatory Map Screen
AstroMapBoard.Notes: A huge screen that displays the map of the Comet Observatory.

BirdLouseL.Name: Large Cloud Particles
BirdLouseL.Notes: A large cloud effect used in a few galaxies, such as Wild Glide Galaxy and Freezy Flake Galaxy.

GlobalPointGravity.Name: Spherical Gravity
GlobalPointGravity.Notes: A gravity area that attracts objects towards its origin.

RailObj.Name: Subpath
RailObj.Notes: This object is required by ElectricRailTwoPoint and LavaSeparateWaterfall. It sets multiple paths for an object to use.

AstroCountDownPlate.Name: Comet Observatory Star Countdown
AstroCountDownPlate.Notes: The number located at the start of the Comet Observatory that counts down the amount of stars you need to finish the game.

Nyoropon.Name: Snoodle
Nyoropon.Notes: A tall tube worm enemy typically found underwater.

PetitPorterExitPoint.Name: Bonus Planet Teleporter Exit Point
PetitPorterExitPoint.Notes: An optional point that can be used to define the location where the bonus planet teleporter will teleport the player to after the timer ran out.

HShapeBlockSetPlanetParts.Name: Puzzle Plank -- Starting Planet Cubes
HShapeBlockSetPlanetParts.Notes: The pair of wood cubes used at the start of Puzzle Plank Galaxy.

CloudAcrossValleyPlanet.Name: Fluffy Bluff -- Starting Planet
CloudAcrossValleyPlanet.Notes: The starting planet used in Fluffy Bluff Galaxy.

IceMagmaAppearanceStep.Name: Shiverburn -- Rock Platforms
IceMagmaAppearanceStep.Notes: A set of rocks which rise from lava that are used as a platform on the third planet of Shiverburn Galaxy.

LiftFlower.Name: Yellow Disappearing Platform
LiftFlower.Notes: A yellow platform that disappears and reappears periodically.

TrialBallPlanet.Name: Rolling Green: Planet
TrialBallPlanet.Notes: The planet from Rolling Green Galaxy. It features a lot of bridges and flowers, as well as star ball rails and a stand for a windmill.

DiskFlowerPlanet.Name: "DiskFlowerPlanet" [Unused]
DiskFlowerPlanet.Notes: An early version of Good Egg's starting planet that can be seen in the E3 2006 demo.

GarigariCutStepFlatThreeLeft.Name: Puzzle Plank -- Triplet Set of Wood Left Piece
GarigariCutStepFlatThreeLeft.Notes: The left piece of a set of three pieces of wood used in Puzzle Plank Galaxy.

ForceDashCube.Name: Rock Mushroom Boost Area
ForceDashCube.Notes:
An area that gives the player a speed boost when entered using the Rock Mushroom.
Requires a valid KCL floor code of 39 (ForceDash).
The direction of the Dash is determined by the rotation of the area. (Boost is on the Z axis)

StumpObj.Name: Starship Mario -- Stump Platform
StumpObj.Notes: A small tree stump platform used for NPCs that appear on Starship Mario.

RasterScrollArea.Name: Wobbling Screen Area
RasterScrollArea.Notes: An area that, when entered, creates a wobbling screen effect.

DrumSeparateRocketPlanet.Name: Sky Station -- Long House Planet
DrumSeparateRocketPlanet.Notes: The long curved planet used in the first mission of Sky Station Galaxy.

TicoAstro.Name: Luma (Comet Observatory)
TicoAstro.Notes: A special Luma object for the Comet Observatory. Only used by the 3 Green Lumas surrounding the Green Launch Star to the Planet of Trials.

SnowDollKoopaPlanet.Name: Freezy Flake -- Snow Statues Planet
SnowDollKoopaPlanet.Notes: The planet with snow trees and snow statues used in Freezy Flake Galaxy.

FireBarCoverMiniA.Name: Small Fire Bar Barrel
FireBarCoverMiniA.Notes: A small barrel that is used to hide the Used Block of a Fire Bar. Used in Bowser's Lava Lair.

SurpTamakoroExLv2Galaxy.Name: Portal to Rolling Gizmo Galaxy
SurpTamakoroExLv2Galaxy.Notes: A green portal that opens Rolling Gizmo Galaxy's Star select screen when touched during a Launch Star flight.

AstroBaseKitchen.Name: Comet Observatory -- Kitchen Steps
AstroBaseKitchen.Notes: The steps that lead up to the Kitchen in the Comet Observatory.

CoinBox.Name: Invisible Coin Spot
CoinBox.Notes: An invisible spot that will spawn a Coin when using a Spin Attack nearby.

SpiderCoin.Name: Tarantox Web Coin
SpiderCoin.Notes: A coin trapped in Tarantox's web. Touch it to release it from the web.

OtaRock.Name: Octopus
OtaRock.Notes: A large, gray octopus enemy that shoots both fireballs and coconuts at Mario.

HeavenlyBeachPlanet.Name: Beach Bowl: Starting Planet
HeavenlyBeachPlanet.Notes: The starting planet used in Beach Bowl Galaxy.

HugeHammerConveyerUp.Name: Clockwork Ruins --  Hammers Planet Upper Rotating Platform
HugeHammerConveyerUp.Notes: A rotating platform used on the hammer planet in Clockwork Ruins Galaxy.

LavaSpaceStickA.Name: Melty Molten: Lava Rock (Version A)
LavaSpaceStickA.Notes: A lava rock used in the background of Melty Molten Galaxy.

BattleMogucchiPlanet.Name: Battle Belt -- Undergrunt Planet
BattleMogucchiPlanet.Notes: The grassy planet from Battle Belt Galaxy that features two Undergrunts.

BegomanRoomPlanet.Name: "BegomanRoomPlanet" [Unfinished]
BegomanRoomPlanet.Notes: An unfinished planet with checkered textures. It ressembles JumpBeamerRoomPlanet.

BigSandBirdGoalStep.Name: Slipsand -- Sand Bird Planet Ending Platform
BigSandBirdGoalStep.Notes: The ending platform of the Sand Bird planet from Slipsand Galaxy.

SpinCloudFrontDefineArea.Name: Cloud Direction Controller Area
SpinCloudFrontDefineArea.Notes: This area controls and sets the facing direction of Cloud Flower platforms created inside of it.

DinoPackun.Name: Dino Piranha [SMG1]
DinoPackun.Notes: The boss fought at the end of the first mission of Good Egg Galaxy.

Karikari.Name: Slurple
Karikari.Notes: A small blue enemy that will stick onto player if they get near it. If the enemy is not defeated, it will begin to damage the player.

KoopaJrCastlePlanet.Name: Boom Bunker -- Boomsday Machine Planet
KoopaJrCastlePlanet.Notes: The planet where the Boomsday Machine is fought in Bowser Jr.'s Boom Bunker.

LavaSpaceStickB.Name: Melty Molten: Lava Rock (Version B)
LavaSpaceStickB.Notes: A lava rock used in the background of Melty Molten Galaxy.

GhostClipPlanetPartsA.Name: Haunty Halls -- Boo Corridor Rug
GhostClipPlanetPartsA.Notes: The rugs used on the second planet of the second mission of Haunty Halls Galaxy.

EarthenPipePictureBook.Name: Decorative Warp Pipe
EarthenPipePictureBook.Notes: A decorative Warp Pipe that cannot be entered. Used in the game's intro.

SeesawMoveNutB.Name: Moving Screw Nut (Dreadnought)
SeesawMoveNutB.Notes:
A hexagonal-shaped moving screw nut used on Dreadnought Galaxy.

Follows a straight line path back and forth depending on how the player steps on it to make it rotate.

BenefitItemInvincible.Name: Rainbow Star
BenefitItemInvincible.Notes: A collectable power-up that transforms the player into a Rainbow character.

SeesawMoveNutC.Name: Moving Screw Nut (Cylinder)
SeesawMoveNutC.Notes: Textureless cylinder-shaped version of the Dreadnought's moving screw nuts.

TearDropPlanet.Name: Drip Drop -- Main Planet
TearDropPlanet.Notes: The main planet of Drip Drop Galaxy.

MarioFaceShipRudder.Name: Starship Mario -- Steering Wheel
MarioFaceShipRudder.Notes: The steering wheel used on Starship Mario.

SeesawMoveNutA.Name: Moving Screw Nut (Unfinished)
SeesawMoveNutA.Notes: Textureless version of the Dreadnought's moving screw nuts.

SecretGateCounter.Name: Comet Medal Gate Counter
SecretGateCounter.Notes: A controller used to count the amount of gates that the player has moved through.

BarrelCloudActionRotateLiftA.Name: Galaxy Generator -- Rotating Stone Lift
BarrelCloudActionRotateLiftA.Notes: A rotating cylinder from Bowser's Galaxy Generator that has some small platforms attached to it. Used in the section that features Cloud Flowers and Bullet Bills.

SpiderAttachPoint.Name: Tarantox Sling Pod
SpiderAttachPoint.Notes: A variation of the regular Sling Pod used on Tarantox's planet in Space Junk Galaxy. Behaves exactly the same way as the normal Sling Pod, the difference is probably internally to process hits on Tarantox or something along those lines.

DustLava.Name: Lava Particles Debris
DustLava.Notes: A set of lava particles used as space debris.

KinopioBank.Name: Bank Toad
KinopioBank.Notes: A special Toad NPC that allows the player to deposit and withdraw Star Bits.

HugeHammerConveyerDown.Name: Clockwork Ruins --  Hammers Planet Lower Rotating Platform
HugeHammerConveyerDown.Notes: A rotating platform used on the hammer planet in Clockwork Ruins Galaxy.

ConcreteBlock.Name: Rolling Gizmo -- Concrete Block
ConcreteBlock.Notes: A large destroyable concrete block used in Rolling Gizmo Galaxy.

SkyBeachCorals.Name: Starshine Beach -- Decorative Water Coral
SkyBeachCorals.Notes: A set of decorative coral used in Starshine Beach Galaxy.

DrillWaterSpringPlanetFountain.Name: Cosmic Cove -- Water Jet Effect
DrillWaterSpringPlanetFountain.Notes: The fountain effect used on the drill water planet in Cosmic Cove Galaxy.

UFOShapePassThroughPlanet.Name: Sky Station -- Starting Planet
UFOShapePassThroughPlanet.Notes: The planet used at the start of Sky Station Galaxy.

KoopaJrLv2BossRelayPlanet.Name: Fearsome Fleet -- Launch Star Platforms
KoopaJrLv2BossRelayPlanet.Notes: The set of platforms where the Launch Star to the Megahammer planet in Bowser Jr.'s Fearsome Fleet is found.

CubeBubbleExPartsA.Name: Bubble Blast -- Metal Sphere
CubeBubbleExPartsA.Notes: A multi-colored stationary metal sphere that serves as an obstacle in Bubble Blast Galaxy.

DrainPipeBubbleA.Name: Splashing Water Bubbles Effect
DrainPipeBubbleA.Notes: An effect that consists of splashing water bubbles.

MiniStarDustGalaxy.Name: Dome Warp: Space Junk
MiniStarDustGalaxy.Notes: A dome warp to Space Junk Galaxy.

PipeModeCube.Name: Redirect Player Movement Area [Cube]
PipeModeCube.Notes: An area that changes the direction the player is moving to by 90 degrees as soon as entered. The cube's origin is the base's center.

DrainPipeBubbleB.Name: Raising Water Bubbles Effect
DrainPipeBubbleB.Notes: An effect that consists of raising water bubbles.

FluffWind.Name: Fluff Flower Wind
FluffWind.Notes: An object that creates a wind stream used to push the Fluff Flowers.

SummerSky.Name: Beach Bowl Sky
SummerSky.Notes: The sky model used in Beach Bowl Galaxy.

GlobalCubeGravity.Name: Cube Gravity
GlobalCubeGravity.Notes: A gravity area for a cube-shaped planet that allows movement on all six faces.

BrickDust.Name: Floating Bricks Debris
BrickDust.Notes: A group of bricks used as floating debris in both Clockwork Ruins Galaxy and Upside Dizzy Galaxy.

KoopaBackEffect.Name: Peach's Castle -- Decorative Bowser Portal
KoopaBackEffect.Notes: The large portal that Bowser disappears through during the intro sequence at Peach's Castle.

IceLayerBreak.Name: Broken Glass Effect
IceLayerBreak.Notes: A glass-breaking effect used on Launch Stars that require the player to go through glass.

FallDownBridgeRock.Name: Boulder Bowl -- Large Metal Bridge
FallDownBridgeRock.Notes: A large metal bridge that can be knocked over with Rock Mario; used in Boulder Bowl Galaxy.

ClipFieldSwitch.Name: Matter Splatter Controller
ClipFieldSwitch.Notes: A controller that enables Matter Splatter effects.

MarioFaceShipPlanetCore.Name: Starship Mario -- Blue Core
MarioFaceShipPlanetCore.Notes: The blue core used in the power-up display room of Starship Mario.

PullTargetBridge.Name: "PullTargetBridge" [Broken]
PullTargetBridge.Notes: Model files have been removed. Therefore, the object is useless.

WindMillPropellerMini.Name: Rolling Gizmo -- Windmill Propeller
WindMillPropellerMini.Notes: The toy windmill propeller found at the end of Rolling Gizmo Galaxy.

LavaRotatePlanetStartStep.Name: Melty Molten: Rotating Planet (Fixed Platform)
LavaRotatePlanetStartStep.Notes: The stationary platform used on the rotating platform in Melty Molten Galaxy.

CountFlowerPowerStar.Name: Flower Counter Power Star Spawner
CountFlowerPowerStar.Notes: An object that activates a switch and spawns a Power Star once all of its flowers have appeared.

Mogucchi.Name: Undergrunt
Mogucchi.Notes: A mole enemy with a helmet that moves on a path.

NokonokoLand.Name: Koopa Troopa
NokonokoLand.Notes: A small turtle that drops its Shell when jumped on.

CannonFortressMoveWall.Name: Dreadnought -- Collapsing Tower Wall Jump Shaft
CannonFortressMoveWall.Notes: A set of two blocks that move on a path in Dreadnought Galaxy.

StinkBugSmall.Name: Mandibug
StinkBugSmall.Notes: A purple bug that charges at the player once it spots them.

PowerStarKeeperA.Name: Rotating Metal Shields A
PowerStarKeeperA.Notes: A set of rotating metal shields that can be often seen to block a Power Star.

PowerStarKeeperB.Name: Rotating Metal Shields B
PowerStarKeeperB.Notes: A set of rotating metal shields that can be often seen to block a Power Star.

RecoveryFloorControlArea.Name: Enable Ice Collision Rescue Position Area
RecoveryFloorControlArea.Notes: An area that enables saving the last position on Ice or GlassIce collision as a safe rescuing position.

PowerStarKeeperC.Name: Rotating Metal Shields C
PowerStarKeeperC.Notes: A set of rotating metal shields that can be often seen to block a Power Star.

WaterCube.Name: Water Area [Cube]
WaterCube.Notes: An area that consists of an invisible body of water.

ForestHomeBridge.Name: Gold Leaf: Stone Bridge
ForestHomeBridge.Notes: A small stone bridge used in Gold Leaf Galaxy.

BigYellowChipStep.Name: Supermassive -- Star Chip Platform
BigYellowChipStep.Notes: A huge Star Chip that is used as a platform in Supermassive Galaxy.

VsBossJugemAir.Name: Thunderstorm Atmosphere
VsBossJugemAir.Notes: The thunderstorm atmosphere used during the Giga-Lakitu battle in Yoshi Star Galaxy.

BombHeiRed.Name: Bob-omb Buddy
BombHeiRed.Notes: A red Bob-omb NPC from Throwback Galaxy.

SpiderMapBlock.Name: Tarantox Stone Block
SpiderMapBlock.Notes: The destroyable stone blocks on Tarantox's planet in Space Junk Galaxy.

BegomanSpike.Name: Spiky Topman
BegomanSpike.Notes: A red spiky robot enemy that is always spinning.

GreenPlanetOrbitSky.Name: Gusty Garden Sky
GreenPlanetOrbitSky.Notes: The starry sky model used in Gusty Garden Galaxy.

FlagKoopaB.Name: Yellow Bowser Flag
FlagKoopaB.Notes: A yellow flag with Bowser's symbol on it. Used in airship sections.

StarDustStepB.Name: Space Junk: Small Stone Platform B
StarDustStepB.Notes: Another small stone platform from Space Junk Galaxy.

FlagKoopaA.Name: Black Bowser Flag
FlagKoopaA.Notes: A black flag with Bowser's symbol on it.

StarDustStepA.Name: Space Junk: Small Stone Platform A
StarDustStepA.Notes: A small stone platform from Space Junk Galaxy.

WoodCircleCutPlanet.Name: Tall Trunk -- Circular Log Planet
WoodCircleCutPlanet.Notes: The final planet from Tall Trunk Galaxy's first star.

CloudSeaA.Name: Cloudy Court -- Swamp Bowl Planet
CloudSeaA.Notes: The large toxic swamp planet used for the secret Star mission of Cloudy Court Galaxy.

GhostMazePushDoor.Name: Boo Moon -- Disguised Maze Door [Counter-clockwise]
GhostMazePushDoor.Notes:
A door disguised as a wall piece of the dark maze planet in Boo Moon Galaxy.
This variant opens counter-clockwise.

TShapePlanet.Name: Space Junk -- T-Shaped Planet
TShapePlanet.Notes: A futuristic-style metal planet with a tridimensional T-shape.

BreakableTrash.Name: Gearmo Challenge Trash
BreakableTrash.Notes: A pile of trash that the player must destroy during the trash minigames in Battlerock Galaxy and Dreadnought Galaxy.

KoopaJrShip.Name: Bowser Jr.'s Airship (Boss)
KoopaJrShip.Notes: A small airship controlled and tripulated by Bowser Jr. himself, which is the boss of Bowser Jr.'s Airship Armada.

TwisterSanSlim.Name: Slim Galactic Tornado
TwisterSanSlim.Notes: A slim tornado enemy with a somewhat wide attraction range.

CancelBeeMorphArea.Name: Cancel Bee Power-Up Area
CancelBeeMorphArea.Notes: Removes the Bee power-up from the player if they go inside the area.

BigBubbleSwitchCylinder.Name: Big Bubble Switch Area [Cylinder]
BigBubbleSwitchCylinder.Notes: An area that activates a switch once the player enters it while riding a Big Bubble.

BakuBakuClipStep.Name: Lava Lair -- Mattermouth Carpet
BakuBakuClipStep.Notes: The large carpet from Bowser's Lava Lair that is eaten away by Mattermouths.

LuigiNPC.Name: Luigi (NPC)
LuigiNPC.Notes: The Luigi you talk to in Ghostly Galaxy's first star.

TogeBegomanLauncher.Name: Spiky Topman Spawner
TogeBegomanLauncher.Notes: A black hole that spawns Spiky Topman. Defeated Spiky Topman will respawn after some time.

HanachanBig.Name: Big Wiggler
HanachanBig.Notes: A bigger version of a Wiggler. May run around aggressively.

UnderseaTunnelPlanet.Name: Bigmouth -- Main Planet
UnderseaTunnelPlanet.Notes: The massive fish-shaped main planet from Bigmouth Galaxy.

OldFortressTopCover.Name: Throwback -- Top Fortress Cover
OldFortressTopCover.Notes: The cover used at the top of Throwback Galaxy.

Tamakoro.Name: Star Ball
Tamakoro.Notes: A ball with a Power Star or Purple Coin inside it.

Flag.Name: Sea Slide Flag
Flag.Notes: A flag used in both Loopdeeloop Galaxy and Sea Slide Galaxy.

KoopaStatueVomit.Name: Turning Bowser Statue
KoopaStatueVomit.Notes: A statue of Bowser that can turn around. The actual laser is created using an ElectricRail object.

BothSideMazeRoomPlanet.Name: Flipsville -- Starting Planet
BothSideMazeRoomPlanet.Notes: The starting planet used in the first mission of Flipsville Galaxy.

SandBirdPartsTailRight.Name: Sand Bird Right Striped Tail
SandBirdPartsTailRight.Notes: The right piece of the tail of the Sand Bird used in Slipsand Galaxy.

JumpStand.Name: Ground Pound Spring
JumpStand.Notes: A spring that bounces the player into the air when Ground Pounding it.

TrickRabbitFreeRun.Name: Star Bunny (Free Run)
TrickRabbitFreeRun.Notes: A runaway Star Bunny that runs randomly without a path.

PunchBox2D.Name: Brick Block [2D]
PunchBox2D.Notes: A small Brick Block variant that is used in the prologue.

SwitchCube.Name: Switch Area [Cube]
SwitchCube.Notes: An area that activates a switch once the player enters it. The cube's origin is the base's center.

TrialBubbleSPlanet.Name: Bubble Breeze Planet
TrialBubbleSPlanet.Notes: The planet Bubble Breeze Galaxy takes place on. Includes the first section of the galaxy.

GiantRotationRockD.Name: Clockwork Ruins -- Launch Star Gear
GiantRotationRockD.Notes: A gear used to reach the Launch Star on the starting planet of Clockwork Ruins Galaxy.

TwinFallLakeWaterFall.Name: Beach Bowl Twin Falls Waterfall Effect
TwinFallLakeWaterFall.Notes: A waterfall splash effect that is used on the Twin Falls planet in Beach Bowl Galaxy.

GiantRotationRockC.Name: Clockwork Ruins -- Cross Gear
GiantRotationRockC.Notes: A gear with a "cross"-like design of blocks used on the starting planet of Clockwork Ruins Galaxy.

IceCreamPlanet.Name: Toy Time: Ice Cream Planet
IceCreamPlanet.Notes: The ice cream planet from Toy Time Galaxy.

KoopaJrLv2StartPlanet.Name: Fearsome Fleet -- Starting Platforms
KoopaJrLv2StartPlanet.Notes: The set of platforms used at the start of Bowser Jr.'s Fearsome Fleet.

GiantRotationRockB.Name: Clockwork Ruins -- L-Blocks Gear
GiantRotationRockB.Notes: A gear with opposite L-shaped blocks used on the starting planet of Clockwork Ruins Galaxy.

GiantRotationRockA.Name: Clockwork Ruins -- Staircase Gear
GiantRotationRockA.Notes: A gear with opposite staircases used on the starting planet of Clockwork Ruins Galaxy.

SpaceMineRailA.Name: Mine Path Marker (Circle)
SpaceMineRailA.Notes: A circle marker for a mine.

DepthOfFieldSphere.Name: Field Depth Area [Sphere]
DepthOfFieldSphere.Notes: An area that changes the screen depth if the player enters it.

LeafManholeCover.Name: Flipsville -- Flippable Grate
LeafManholeCover.Notes: A red grate that can be flipped over; used in Flipsville Galaxy.

TreasureBoxCrackedCoin.Name: Cracked Treasure Chest with Coin
TreasureBoxCrackedCoin.Notes: A gray treasure chest that reveals a Coin when opened.

AbekobeCircleMoveLift.Name: Rightside Down -- Checkered Moving Wood Platform
AbekobeCircleMoveLift.Notes: A moving platform from Rightside Down Galaxy. It has a checker patterned surface.

TreasureBoxYellowChip.Name: Treasure Chest with Star Chip
TreasureBoxYellowChip.Notes: A brown treasure chest that reveals a Star Chip when opened.

BloomSphere.Name: Bloom Effect Area [Sphere]
BloomSphere.Notes: An area that enables bloom shading for compatible objects inside it.

WanwanEscapePlanet.Name: Chompworks -- Lava Chomps Planet
WanwanEscapePlanet.Notes: The second planet used that features a long bridge Chompworks Galaxy.

GravityFollowLift2DPlanet.Name: Upside Dizzy -- Starting Section
GravityFollowLift2DPlanet.Notes: The first section of the first planet used in Upside Dizzy Galaxy.

FullMoonPlanet.Name: Small Bright Moon Planet
FullMoonPlanet.Notes: A small and bright moon planet from Sand Spiral Galaxy that emits an intense bloom when seen from a distance.

GlobalDiskTorusGravity.Name: Torus Gravity
GlobalDiskTorusGravity.Notes: A gravity area for a torus-shaped planet.

WaterFortressRain.Name: Space Storm Rain
WaterFortressRain.Notes: The rain effect from Space Storm Galaxy. This will crash the game without a specific setup.

TeresaMansionGatePlanet.Name: Ghostly -- Starting Planet
TeresaMansionGatePlanet.Notes: A gray planet with dead trees, abandoned stone structures and a hole in the center.

ConstructionLight.Name: Construction Light
ConstructionLight.Notes: A destroyable construction light; used in Spin-Dig Galaxy.

MarioLauncher.Name: Player Cannon
MarioLauncher.Notes: A cannon that the player can use to shoot themselves to distant places.

SecretGate.Name: Comet Medal Gate
SecretGate.Notes: A red and yellow gate used in gliding levels to unlock the Comet Medal for collection afterwards.

BlueStarGuidanceArea.Name: Pull Star Explanation Area
BlueStarGuidanceArea.Notes: An area that, if entered, notifies the player how to use Pull Stars.

Gorogoro.Name: Rhomp
Gorogoro.Notes: A cylindrical-shaped rolling stone obstacle used in Slipsand Galaxy.

LavaDrillKillerPlanet.Name: Galaxy Generator -- Banzai Bill Planet
LavaDrillKillerPlanet.Notes: The planet with Banzai Bills and the Spin Drill used in Bowser's Galaxy Generator.

BossKameck.Name: Kamella
BossKameck.Notes: A large Magikoopa fought in Space Junk Galaxy.

RailCoin.Name: Coin Line
RailCoin.Notes: An object that creates a path of Coins.

BallRail.Name: Star Ball Rail
BallRail.Notes: An invisible path that the Star Ball will move on once touched.

DotPatternSky.Name: Twisty Trials Sky
DotPatternSky.Notes: The sky model used in Twisty Trials Galaxy.

HeavenlyBeachTimerStepA.Name: Beach Bowl Appearing Platform A
HeavenlyBeachTimerStepA.Notes: A set of boardwalk platforms from Beach Bowl that appear when a switch is pressed.

FloaterLandPartsA.Name: Buoy Base: Fortress Parts (Unused)
FloaterLandPartsA.Notes: An unused set of fortress parts intended for Buoy Base Galaxy.

UFOKinokoUnderConstruction.Name: Comet Observatory -- Starshroom
UFOKinokoUnderConstruction.Notes: This object represents all the construction stages of the Starshroom seen in the Garage, including the finished one, and picks the stage to load based on the current savefile's progress.

HeavenlyBeachTimerStepB.Name: Beach Bowl Appearing Platform B
HeavenlyBeachTimerStepB.Notes: A pair of vertical walls from Beach Bowl that appear when a switch is pressed.

MiniMechaKoopaPartsMoveStepA.Name: Toy Time: Factory Moving Platform
MiniMechaKoopaPartsMoveStepA.Notes: A blue moving platform from the factory planet from Toy Time Galaxy.

ArrowSwitchTarget.Name: Multi-Use Arrow Switch Target
ArrowSwitchTarget.Notes: A target that triggers a switch based off of the state of the ArrowSwitchMulti that it belongs to.

AncientCage.Name: Clockwork Ruins -- Luma Cage
AncientCage.Notes: The red metal cage from Clockwork Ruins Galaxy.

Togezo.Name: Spiny
Togezo.Notes: A red-shelled enemy with spikes on its back.

TamakoroWithTutorial.Name: Star Ball with Tutorial
TamakoroWithTutorial.Notes: A Star Ball which uses a signboard tutorial to explain the Star Ball mechanics.

UFOKinokoLandingAstro.Name: Landed Starshroom [No Interior]
UFOKinokoLandingAstro.Notes: A variant of UFOKinokoLanding with no interior and opaque windows that is used in Grand Finale Galaxy.

BeyondHorizonSky.Name: Slimy Spring Sky
BeyondHorizonSky.Notes: The sunset sky model from Slimy Spring Galaxy.

DepthOfFieldCube.Name: Field Depth Area [Cube]
DepthOfFieldCube.Notes: An area that changes the screen depth if the player enters it. The cube's origin is the volume's center.

RailMoveDisappearStep.Name: Throwback -- Collapsing Stone Platform
RailMoveDisappearStep.Notes: A stone platform that falls when the player steps on it.

DeathPromenadeMovePartsSpuareA.Name: Boo's Boneyard -- Moving Rectangular Block
DeathPromenadeMovePartsSpuareA.Notes: A moving rectangular stone block used in Boo's Boneyard Galaxy.

NeedleTrapSide.Name: Wall Spike Trap
NeedleTrapSide.Notes: A wall-connected trap with spikes that pop out periodically.

Kiraira.Name: Underwater Mine
Kiraira.Notes: A stationary mine used in Deep Dark Galaxy.

BendSwanpStepA.Name: Boo Moon -- Folding Swamp Starting Platform
BendSwanpStepA.Notes: The starting platform from Boo Moon Galaxy's folding swamp planet.

BegomanSpringHide.Name: Passive Spring Topman
BegomanSpringHide.Notes: A variant of a Spring Topman that resides in the ground and jumps out once the player gets near. It emits a Topmini if hit with a Spin Attack.

GoldenTurtle.Name: Gold Shell
GoldenTurtle.Notes: A golden Koopa Shell that can be used to open specific treasure chests.

BattleShipExplosionRock.Name: Rock Explosion Effect
BattleShipExplosionRock.Notes: A rock explosion effect used in the third mission of Battlerock Galaxy.

Blue2DSky.Name: Honeybloom Sky
Blue2DSky.Notes: The sky model used in Honeybloom Galaxy.

TwilightAir.Name: Twilight Atmosphere
TwilightAir.Notes: The unusual red atmosphere used in Bubble Breeze Galaxy.

DashRing.Name: Boost Ring
DashRing.Notes: A ring that boosts the speed of the player when passed through.

GraveStoneA.Name: Space Junk: Graveyard Planet
GraveStoneA.Notes: The graveyard planet that is located in the Space Junk Galaxy.

KoopaNpc.Name: Tiny Bowser
KoopaNpc.Notes: A tiny version of Bowser used in the end credits.

GraveStoneC.Name: Space Junk: Gray Stone (L-Shaped)
GraveStoneC.Notes: A L-shaped gray stone that appears in the Space Junk Galaxy.

GraveStoneB.Name: Space Junk: Gray Stone (Rectangular)
GraveStoneB.Notes: A rectangular gray stone that appears in the Space Junk Galaxy.

AuroraSky.Name: Freezeflame Sky
AuroraSky.Notes: The sky model from Freezeflame Galaxy that features auroras.

GraveStoneE.Name: Space Junk: Gray Stone (Unfinished Sphere)
GraveStoneE.Notes: An unfinished spherical gray stone that was supposed to appear in the Space Junk Galaxy.

MirrorModelPeachCastle.Name: Peach's Castle (Low-poly Mirrored)
MirrorModelPeachCastle.Notes: A mirrored low-poly version of the Peach's Castle at the beginning of the game (SMG1)

GraveStoneD.Name: Space Junk: Gray Stone (Unfinished L-Shape)
GraveStoneD.Notes: An unfinished L-shaped gray stone that was supposed to appear in the Space Junk Galaxy.

StarPieceSpot.Name: Star Bit Spawn Point
StarPieceSpot.Notes: An object that spawns several Star Bits when activated.

GhostTower2DPlanet.Name: Boo Moon -- Mansion Planet
GhostTower2DPlanet.Notes: The large mansion planet used in the second mission of Boo Moon Galaxy.

OnimasuPlanet.Name: Beach Bowl: Cyclone Stone Planet (Section A)
OnimasuPlanet.Notes: The first section of the planet used at the end of the third mission of Beach Bowl Galaxy.

ChooChooTrainStationPlanet.Name: Toy Time -- Train Station
ChooChooTrainStationPlanet.Notes: The train station planet from Toy Time Galaxy.

GhostMazeWall.Name: Boo Moon -- Maze Planet Blockade
GhostMazeWall.Notes: A wall used to block access to the Warp Pipe on the maze planet of Boo Moon Galaxy.

GiantTeresaCirclePlanet.Name: Haunty Halls -- Starting Planet
GiantTeresaCirclePlanet.Notes: The solid platforms used on the starting planet of Haunty Halls Galaxy.

DashChargeCylinder.Name: Fast Running Area [Cylinder]
DashChargeCylinder.Notes: An area that, when entered, turns the player yellow and causes them to run faster.

PhantomDecoratePartsHole.Name: Ghostly: Decorative Hole Planet
PhantomDecoratePartsHole.Notes: A decorative planet with many holes in it, from Ghostly Galaxy.

CrystalCageOpaLL.Name: Large Opaque Crystal
CrystalCageOpaLL.Notes: A large destroyable crystal that is not transparent.

HazeCube.Name: Haze Area [Cube]
HazeCube.Notes: A haze screen effect used in lava-themed galaxies. The cube's origin is the base's center.

GeneralRestartPos.Name: Star Ball Respawn Position
GeneralRestartPos.Notes: Can be used to define a Star Ball's respawn position after collecting a Checkpoint Flag.

BendSwanpStepC.Name: Boo Moon -- Folding Swamp Curved Platform
BendSwanpStepC.Notes: The curved platform from Boo Moon Galaxy's folding swamp planet.

PhantomBonfire.Name: Red Flame
PhantomBonfire.Notes: A small red flame used on a torch.

BendSwanpStepB.Name: Boo Moon -- Folding Swamp Midway Platform
BendSwanpStepB.Notes: The second platform from Boo Moon Galaxy's folding swamp planet.

BigBubbleCameraCylinder.Name: Big Bubble Camera Area [Cylinder]
BigBubbleCameraCylinder.Notes: An area that causes the camera to change when the player enters it while riding a Big Bubble.

TriangleTowerRotateStepSpring.Name: Chompworks -- Spring Tower Rotating Metal Gear
TriangleTowerRotateStepSpring.Notes: A rotating metal gear used on the spring tower planet in Chompworks Galaxy.

WarpPod.Name: Warp Pad
WarpPod.Notes: A warp pad that warps the player from one place to another. May also be invisible depending on the setup.

WaterFortressRotateStepD.Name: Space Storm -- Thin Rotating Metal Platforms
WaterFortressRotateStepD.Notes: A set of thin red rotating metal platforms from Space Storm Galaxy.

HShapeBlockSetPlanet.Name: Puzzle Plank -- Wiggler Planet
HShapeBlockSetPlanet.Notes: The planet where two Wigglers and a large H-shaped hole are found; used in Puzzle Plank Galaxy.

TreasureBoxCrackedYellowChip.Name: Cracked Treasure Chest with Star Chip
TreasureBoxCrackedYellowChip.Notes: A gray treasure chest that reveals a Star Chip when opened.

FallDownWall.Name: Fleet Glide -- Large Metal Door
FallDownWall.Notes: A large metal door that closes near the end of Fleet Glide Galaxy.

MiniCannonFleetGalaxy.Name: Dome Warp: Dreadnought
MiniCannonFleetGalaxy.Notes: A dome warp to Dreadnought Galaxy.

SeaGullGroupMarioFace.Name: Seagulls [Starship Mario]
SeaGullGroupMarioFace.Notes: A group of seagulls that appear in the background of Starship Mario if the player is currently in World 1.

TamakoroPlanetStartPlanet.Name: Rolling Masterpiece -- Starting Planet
TamakoroPlanetStartPlanet.Notes: The planet used at the start of Rolling Masterpiece Galaxy.

WaterFortressRotateStepB.Name: Space Storm -- Blue Rotating Metal Platforms
WaterFortressRotateStepB.Notes: A set of blue rotating metal platforms from Space Storm Galaxy.

WaterFortressRotateStepA.Name: Space Storm -- Red Rotating Metal Platforms
WaterFortressRotateStepA.Notes: A set of red rotating metal platforms from Space Storm Galaxy.

BeyondHellValleySky.Name: Shiverburn Sky
BeyondHellValleySky.Notes: The sky model from Shiverburn Galaxy that features the infamous alien creatures.

AttackRockTutorial.Name: Bowser Attack Rock [Stage]
AttackRockTutorial.Notes: A yellow orb that appears before the fights against Bowser.

TamakoroGarigariCylinderPlanet.Name: Rolling Masterpiece -- Solid Grinder Platform
TamakoroGarigariCylinderPlanet.Notes: The last wooden platform from the Grinder section in Rolling Masterpiece Galaxy that does not disappear.

AssemblyBlockPlanet.Name: Space Junk -- Silver Star Planet
AssemblyBlockPlanet.Notes: The planet at the start of the Silver Star section in the first mission of Space Junk Galaxy.

MiniOceanPhantomCaveGalaxy.Name: Dome Warp: Deep Dark
MiniOceanPhantomCaveGalaxy.Notes: A dome warp to Deep Dark Galaxy.

SpringJetWater.Name: Water Spring (Effect)
SpringJetWater.Notes: A water spring effect from Dreadnought Galaxy.

HolePlanetInsideSky.Name: Spin-Dig Sky
HolePlanetInsideSky.Notes: The sky model used in Spin-Dig Galaxy.

ItemBlockSwitch.Name: Switch ? Block
ItemBlockSwitch.Notes: A ? Block that triggers a switch after being hit.

ItemCollectionPlanet.Name: Starship Mario -- Power-Up Display Room
ItemCollectionPlanet.Notes: The power-up display room used on Starship Mario.

PlaneCircularModeCube.Name: Circular 2D Movement Area
PlaneCircularModeCube.Notes: An area that restricts movement to a 2D plane when entered. The movement direction is adjusted for moving around a circular center point. The cube's origin is the base's center.

StrayTico.Name: Silver Star
StrayTico.Notes: A Silver Star that is trapped in a bubble. The player usually has to collect five of them to make a Power Star appear.

SwitchingMoveBuzzAreaBlockRed.Name: Flip-Out -- Chopper Section Red Walls
SwitchingMoveBuzzAreaBlockRed.Notes: A set of red walls used in the middle section of Flip-Out Galaxy's main planet.

LavaShellTower.Name: Melty Molten Sinking Lava Spire
LavaShellTower.Notes: A large and tall stone spire that sinks down, found in Melty Molten Galaxy.

RelayDrill2DPlanet.Name: Spin-Dig -- Cylinder Planet
RelayDrill2DPlanet.Notes: The cylindrical-shaped planet used in the second mission of Spin-Dig Galaxy.

KoopaBattleLv3Planet.Name: Galaxy Generator -- Bowser Battle Planet
KoopaBattleLv3Planet.Notes: The planet where Bowser is fought in Bowser's Galaxy Generator.

ChangeBgmCube.Name: Music Change Area [Cube]
ChangeBgmCube.Notes: Changes the stage's background music in various different ways if entered. The cube's origin is the base's center.

HomingKiller.Name: Bullet Bill Spawner
HomingKiller.Notes: A bullet-like enemy that may home onto the player if they get in its range.

DropOfWaterPlanet.Name: Good Egg -- Big Water Planet Center
DropOfWaterPlanet.Notes: The center of the big water planets used in the background of Good Egg Galaxy.

KinokoTwinsPlanetA.Name: Honeyhive Mushroom Twin Planet (Light Colored)
KinokoTwinsPlanetA.Notes:
The lighter colored version of the Mushroom Twins wooden planets found in Honeyhive Galaxy.

* Not to be confused with the standard Mario power-up mushroom shape, this is not what these planets are, the "mushroom" shape is from a real life mushroom.

KinokoTwinsPlanetB.Name: Honeyhive Mushroom Twin Planet (Dark Colored)
KinokoTwinsPlanetB.Notes:
The darker colored version of the Mushroom Twins wooden planets found in Honeyhive Galaxy.

* Not to be confused with the standard Mario power-up mushroom shape, this is not what these planets are, the "mushroom" shape is from a real life mushroom.

BeeWallClimbPartsA.Name: Honeycomb Panel
BeeWallClimbPartsA.Notes: A hexagonal honeycomb panel that can be placed on a path. The player can climb on it using the Bee power-up.

CrescentSeesawPlanet.Name: Boo Moon -- Rotatable Crescent Moon
CrescentSeesawPlanet.Notes: The rotatable crescent moon used in Boo Moon Galaxy.

SnowMoundL.Name: Snow Tree
SnowMoundL.Notes: A large destroyable tree made of snow; used in Freezy Flake Galaxy.

HopperBeltConveyerMovePartsA.Name: Toy Time: Conveyor Belt
HopperBeltConveyerMovePartsA.Notes: A conveyor belt used in Toy Time Galaxy. (This object requires repeat settings.)

ChallengeBallVanishingRoadA.Name: Rolling Gizmo -- Vanishing Bridge
ChallengeBallVanishingRoadA.Notes: The blue and yellow bridge that vanishes when the player destroys the Star Ball at the end of Rolling Gizmo Galaxy.

TimeAttackClock.Name: Plus Clock
TimeAttackClock.Notes: A stopwatch that adds additional seconds to the Comet timer.

BlueStarCupsulePlanet.Name: Pull Star Planet
BlueStarCupsulePlanet.Notes: A transparent planet with a Pull Star inside; used in Space Junk Galaxy, Ghostly Galaxy and Space Storm Galaxy.

KuriboFence.Name: Fluffy Bluff -- Circular Fence
KuriboFence.Notes: A circular fence that is used in The Chimp's challenge in Fluffy Buff Galaxy.

BigFan.Name: Large Fan
BigFan.Notes: A large fan with legs that creates gust that can push Bubbles and the player if they use the Boo power-up.

SandUpDownTowerTopEffect.Name: Moving Tower Effect (Sand Tower)
SandUpDownTowerTopEffect.Notes: A moving tower effect from Dusty Dunes Galaxy.

MiniKoopaJrShipLv1Galaxy.Name: Dome Warp: Airship Armada
MiniKoopaJrShipLv1Galaxy.Notes: A dome warp to Bowser Jr.'s Airship Armada.

BigTreePlanetBranchA.Name: Tall Trunk -- Large Tree Planet Platforms A
BigTreePlanetBranchA.Notes: A set of platforms used on the tree planet in Tall Trunk Galaxy.

TicoComet.Name: Prankster Comet Luma
TicoComet.Notes: The dark purple Luma holding star rods in the Comet Observatory who moves Prankester Comets around in exchange for some starbits.

BigTreePlanetBranchB.Name: Tall Trunk -- Large Tree Planet Platforms B
BigTreePlanetBranchB.Notes: A set of planks used on the tree planet in Tall Trunk Galaxy.

GarigariCutStepFlatThinLeft.Name: Puzzle Plank -- Left Thin Piece of Wood
GarigariCutStepFlatThinLeft.Notes: A left-sided thin piece of wood used in Puzzle Plank Galaxy.

StarPieceClusterRock.Name: Rock Mushroom Star Bit Crystal
StarPieceClusterRock.Notes: A small blue crystal that releases four Star Bits when broken using the Rock power-up; used in Melty Monster Galaxy.

FamicomMarioSky.Name: Flipswitch Sky
FamicomMarioSky.Notes: The Super Mario Bros. sky model used in Flipswitch Galaxy.

FloaterOtakingFloaterA.Name: Lava Reactor: Hexagonal Floater
FloaterOtakingFloaterA.Notes: A hexagonal lava floater that appears in Bowser Jr.'s Lava Reactor.

ViewGroupCtrlCube.Name: View Group Area [Cube]
ViewGroupCtrlCube.Notes: When entered by the player, all compatible objects in its ViewGroup will be forced to render. The cube's origin is the base's center.

BattleWaterTeresaPlanet.Name: Battle Belt -- Water Boo Planet
BattleWaterTeresaPlanet.Notes: The underwater section planet from Battle Belt Galaxy that features several Water Boos.

GlaringLightArea.Name: Glaring Light Area
GlaringLightArea.Notes: A shining light area that kills Boos when they enter it.

SandBreezeS.Name: Sand Breeze Effect (Small)
SandBreezeS.Notes: A small sand breeze effect used in desert-themed galaxies.

TwoLegs.Name: Digga-Leg
TwoLegs.Notes: The boss fought at the end of the first mission of Spin-Dig Galaxy.

BigBubbleSwitchBox.Name: Big Bubble Switch Area [Cube]
BigBubbleSwitchBox.Notes: An area that activates a switch once the player enters it while riding a Big Bubble. The cube's origin is the base's center.

KinopioPostman.Name: Mail Toad
KinopioPostman.Notes: A special Toad NPC that delivers letters to the player.

SandBreezeL.Name: Sand Breeze Effect (Large)
SandBreezeL.Notes: A large sand breeze effect used in desert-themed galaxies.

TreasureBoxKinokoOneUp.Name: Treasure Chest with 1-Up Mushroom
TreasureBoxKinokoOneUp.Notes: A brown treasure chest that reveals a 1-Up Mushroom when opened.

WoodLogBridge.Name: Wide Wood Bridge
WoodLogBridge.Notes: Creates a suspension bridge consisting of long logs.

PhantomSky.Name: Ghostly Sky
PhantomSky.Notes: The sky model used in Ghostly Galaxy and Boo Moon Galaxy.

RelayPlanetB.Name: Small Asteroid Planet B
RelayPlanetB.Notes: The asteroid planet with the Launch Star leading to the Fiery Dino Piranha planet in Boss Blitz Galaxy.

BloomCube.Name: Bloom Effect Area [Cube]
BloomCube.Notes: An area that enables bloom shading for compatible objects inside it. The cube's origin is the volume's center.

IcePlanetLight.Name: Eerie Light
IcePlanetLight.Notes: An eerie light effect from Space Junk's glass planet.

RelayPlanetA.Name: Small Asteroid Planet A
RelayPlanetA.Notes: A small asteroid used in the background of certain galaxies, such as Space Junk Galaxy and Spin Dig Galaxy.

JrRobotStep.Name: Fearsome Fleet -- Megahammer Planet
JrRobotStep.Notes: The planet where Megahammer is fought in Bowser Jr.'s Fearsome Fleet.

RelayPlanetD.Name: Bubble Blast: Asteroid Planet
RelayPlanetD.Notes: A small blue asteroid used in Bubble Blast Galaxy.

RelayPlanetC.Name: Wood Planet (Unused)
RelayPlanetC.Notes: A wooden planet that is unused in the original game.

DustIceCrystal.Name: Ice Debris
DustIceCrystal.Notes: A set of ice crystals used as space debris.

MiniFlipPanelExGalaxy.Name: Dome Warp: Flipswitch
MiniFlipPanelExGalaxy.Notes: A dome warp to Flipswitch Galaxy.

RelayPlanetF.Name: Toy Time: Metal Planet
RelayPlanetF.Notes: A small rusty metal planet used in Toy Time Galaxy.

RelayPlanetE.Name: Deep Dark: Wood Planet
RelayPlanetE.Notes: A small wooden planet used in Deep Dark Galaxy.

RelayPlanetH.Name: Gateway: Metal Planet (Square Slot)
RelayPlanetH.Notes: A planet very similar to the metal planets in Gateway Galaxy. It has a place on one end for a cannon or similar square object.

WaterSphereCoralPlanet.Name: Starshine Beach -- Starting Planet
WaterSphereCoralPlanet.Notes: The starting planet from Starshine Beach Galaxy. It has a lot of corals.

StoryBookOpeningPlanet.Name: Prologue -- Starting Planet
StoryBookOpeningPlanet.Notes: The planet used at the start of the prologue.

Balloonfish.Name: Porcupuffer
Balloonfish.Notes: A purple blowfish enemy from Drip Drop Galaxy and Cosmic Cove Galaxy.

RepeatBlockShadowChangeArea.Name: Snake Block Shadow Direction Area
RepeatBlockShadowChangeArea.Notes: An area that changes the direction for snake blocks.

ExterminationMeramera.Name: Power Star Spawner [Li'l Cinders]
ExterminationMeramera.Notes: A controller that spawns a Power Star if all assigned ChildMeramera objects have been killed.

SmallStone.Name: Stone Circle
SmallStone.Notes: A circle of stones that spawns Star Bits when the player shakes the Wii Remote nearby.

YoshiKillerThrowPlanet.Name: Fearsome Fleet -- First Checkpoint Planet
YoshiKillerThrowPlanet.Notes: A set of two blue platforms which contain the first checkpoint before the Megahammer boss fight in Bowser Jr.'s Fearsome Fleet.

BossBussun.Name: Glamdozer
BossBussun.Notes: The boss used at the end of the first mission of Flipsville Galaxy.

KoopaLv3Seesaw.Name: Galaxy Generator -- Stone Seesaw Platform
KoopaLv3Seesaw.Notes: A stone seesaw platform used in Bowser's Galaxy Generator.

EffectArea.Name: Flower Petals Effect Area
EffectArea.Notes: An area that changes the dust cloud effects into flower petals when the player is running or stomping.

GliBird.Name: Fluzzard
GliBird.Notes: The colorful bird used for the Gliding minigames in Wild Glide Galaxy and Fleet Glide Galaxy.

LavaHomeVolcanoInnerFlow.Name: Melty Molten: Volcano Lava (Rising)
LavaHomeVolcanoInnerFlow.Notes: The rising lava used inside the volcano in Melty Molten Galaxy.

NoteFairy.Name: Rainbow Notes
NoteFairy.Notes: A set of Rainbow Notes that can be collected, usually to unlock a bonus.

FlexibleSandPlanet.Name: Dusty Dune: Sand Tide Planet Solids
FlexibleSandPlanet.Notes: The solid parts of the sand tide planet located in the Dusty Dune Galaxy.

ZeroGravityRoomRotateStep.Name: Slipsand -- 2D Underground Rotating Stone
ZeroGravityRoomRotateStep.Notes: A rotating stone from the 2D underground section in Slipsand Galaxy.

StarPieceSpotEruption.Name: Star Bit Volcano Eruption
StarPieceSpotEruption.Notes: Spawns a bunch of Star Bits when activated. This also creates a volcanic eruption effect.

RayGunPlanetPartsScrew.Name: Toy Time: Giant Screw
RayGunPlanetPartsScrew.Notes: The giant screw from Toy Time Galaxy.

StarDustStar.Name: Question Mark Hill Planet (Unused)
StarDustStar.Notes: A strange planet with weird-shaped hills.

WaterLeakPipe.Name: Leaking Pipe
WaterLeakPipe.Notes: A blue pipe with some visual water leaking out of it. Can be used to create ice platforms when touched while using the Ice power-up.

BothSideMazeRoomDrillPlanet.Name: Flipsville -- Starting Planet with Drill Spots
BothSideMazeRoomDrillPlanet.Notes: The starting planet used in the second mission of Flipsville Galaxy, covered in dirt.

LavaShellTowerStep.Name: Melty Molten Sinking Lava Spire Starting Platform
LavaShellTowerStep.Notes: The small starting platform Mario lands on when arriving at the Sinking Lava Spire on Melty Molten Galaxy.

Nigero.Name: Kleptoad
Nigero.Notes: A small blue frog enemy that steals several items; used in Hightail Falls Galaxy.

Sandy.Name: Squizzard
Sandy.Notes: The boss fought at the end of the first mission of Slipsand Galaxy.

LavaObstacleRockHomeB.Name: Melty Molten: Falling Stone Rock (Version B)
LavaObstacleRockHomeB.Notes: A falling stone platform used on the starting planet in Melty Molten Galaxy.

JumpBeamer.Name: Jump Beamer
JumpBeamer.Notes: A robot-like enemy that emits electrical rings. Its head can be used as a spring.

BombHeiLeadingOuterPlanet.Name: Space Storm -- Bob-omb Planet Exterior
BombHeiLeadingOuterPlanet.Notes: The exterior of the cylindrical glass planet from Space Storm Galaxy.

WanwanEscapePlanetParts.Name: Chompworks -- Lava Chomps Planet Side Platforms
WanwanEscapePlanetParts.Notes: The solid blue platforms used on the lava Chomps planet in Chompworks Galaxy.

MiniTriLegLv1Galaxy.Name: Dome Warp: Robot Reactor
MiniTriLegLv1Galaxy.Notes: A dome warp to Bowser Jr.'s Robot Reactor.

MysteryMoveStepB.Name: Sweet Mystery -- Blue Moving Present Box
MysteryMoveStepB.Notes: A blue present-box platform used in Sweet Mystery Galaxy.

MysteryMoveStepC.Name: Sweet Mystery -- Yellow Moving Present Box
MysteryMoveStepC.Notes: A yellow present box platform used in Sweet Mystery Galaxy.

RingBeamerAreaObj.Name: Ring Beam Indicator
RingBeamerAreaObj.Notes: A ring used to indicate the size of the electric rings that a Sentry Beam fires off.

RockPlanetOrbitSky.Name: Battlerock Sky
RockPlanetOrbitSky.Notes: The dark green sky model used in Battlerock Galaxy.

MysteryMoveStepA.Name: Sweet Mystery -- Red Moving Present Box
MysteryMoveStepA.Notes: A red present-box platform used in Sweet Mystery Galaxy.

OldFortressRotateStep.Name: Throwback -- Rotating Bridge
OldFortressRotateStep.Notes: A rotating wood bridge used in Throwback Galaxy.

WaterFortressConveyerB.Name: Space Storm -- Rotating Wood Platform B
WaterFortressConveyerB.Notes: One of the rotating wood platforms from Space Storm Galaxy's second mission.

WaterFortressConveyerC.Name: Space Storm -- Rotating Wood Platform C
WaterFortressConveyerC.Notes: One of the rotating wood platforms from Space Storm Galaxy's second mission.

ForbidTriangleJumpCube.Name: Prevent Angled Wall Jump Area [Cube]
ForbidTriangleJumpCube.Notes: An area that prevents angled Wall Jumps inside of it. The cube's origin is the base's center.

WaterFortressConveyerD.Name: Space Storm -- Rotating Wood Platform D
WaterFortressConveyerD.Notes: One of the rotating wood platforms from Space Storm Galaxy's second mission.

TridentPlanet.Name: Planet of Trials
TridentPlanet.Notes: The trident-shaped planet near the Comet Observatory where the Trial Galaxies and the Grand Finale Galaxy entrances are located (once unlocked).

VsBoomerangBrosPlanet.Name: Boom Bunker -- Hammer Bros. Planet
VsBoomerangBrosPlanet.Notes: The second planet used in Bowser Jr.'s Boom Bunker.

ReverseClipConveyerPlanet.Name: Haunty Halls -- Mattermouth Corridor Planet
ReverseClipConveyerPlanet.Notes: The corridor planet used at the end of the second mission of Haunty Halls Galaxy.

SceneChangeArea.Name: Open Sky Station Star Select Area
SceneChangeArea.Notes: An area that, when entered, loads the Star select screen for Sky Station Galaxy.

SandStreamMoveStepsA.Name: Dusty Dune: Rotating Stones A
SandStreamMoveStepsA.Notes: A set of rotating stones from Dusty Dune Galaxy.

FlipPanelPlanetA.Name: Good Egg: Flipswitch Planet
FlipPanelPlanetA.Notes: The flipswitch planet located in the Good Egg Galaxy.

WaterFortressConveyerA.Name: Space Storm -- Rotating Wood Platform A
WaterFortressConveyerA.Notes: One of the rotating wood platforms from Space Storm Galaxy's second mission.

LongCylinderFlowSandPlanet.Name: Slipsand -- Starting Planet
LongCylinderFlowSandPlanet.Notes: The flowing sand planet used at the start of Slipsand Galaxy.

SandStreamMoveStepsB.Name: Dusty Dune: Rotating Stones B
SandStreamMoveStepsB.Notes: Another set of rotating stones from Dusty Dune Galaxy.

MarblePlanet.Name: Deep Dark Watermelon Glass Cage Planet
MarblePlanet.Notes:
A glass planet with 3 orange balls and a watermelon caged inside. Found in Deep Dark Galaxy.

Extra notes: The orange balls can be ground-pounded towards the watermelon* in the center to expand it, breaking the glass cage on the third and final hit, while also spawning a Power Star on the retail mission.

* The orange ball gets consumed when it hits the watermelon.

GliderForestWaterfallRelayPlanet.Name: Wild Glide -- Waterfalls Planet
GliderForestWaterfallRelayPlanet.Notes: The section featuring three tunnels and waterfalls used in Wild Glide Galaxy.

SnowDollKuribo.Name: Snow Goomba Statue
SnowDollKuribo.Notes: A destroyable statue of a Goomba made from snow; used in Freezy Flake Galaxy.

CocoNut.Name: Coconut
CocoNut.Notes: A green coconut. Changes to a watermelon when the player has 9999 Star Bits.

DreamerDeadCountArea.Name: Cosmic Spirit Death Counter Area
DreamerDeadCountArea.Notes: An area that counts the number of deaths until the Cosmic Spirit appears.

SunLightAreaBox.Name: Sunlight Area [Cube]
SunLightAreaBox.Notes: An area of "invisible light" that will kill any Boos or remove the Boo power-up from the player when entered.

BigEarthenPipeExtend.Name: Supermassive -- Large Moving Pipe
BigEarthenPipeExtend.Notes: A large moving Pipe from Supermassive Galaxy.

OctopusTrapPlanet.Name: "Temporary High Model" Planet
OctopusTrapPlanet.Notes:
Yet another "Temporary High Model" object.
See: https://tcrf.net/Super_Mario_Galaxy/Unused_Models#Placeholder_Planets

StoryBookAreaText.Name: Picture Book Text Area
StoryBookAreaText.Notes: Displays some text if entered during a Picture Book sequence.

IcicleRockLight.Name: Icicle Rock Light
IcicleRockLight.Notes: A glittering effect for icicle rocks.

SpinCloudItem.Name: Cloud Flower
SpinCloudItem.Notes: A Cloud Flower that turns the player into a Cloud character, which allows them to create up to 3 temporary cloud platforms.

KoopaJrCastleGatePlanet.Name: Fiery Flotilla -- Starting Planet
KoopaJrCastleGatePlanet.Notes: The planet used at the start of Bowser Jr.'s Fiery Flotilla.

PunchBox.Name: Brick Block
PunchBox.Notes: A standard Brick Block that can be destroyed.

BgmVolumeFadeArea.Name: Music Volume Area
BgmVolumeFadeArea.Notes: Changes the background music's volume if entered.

BindEndArea.Name: "BindEnd" Area [Useless]
BindEndArea.Notes: A useless area object that has no actual effect in-game.

MiniDarkRoomGalaxy.Name: Dome Warp: Matter Splatter
MiniDarkRoomGalaxy.Notes: A dome warp to Matter Splatter Galaxy.

GlobalPlaneGravityInCylinder.Name: Planar Gravity [Cylinder Range]
GlobalPlaneGravityInCylinder.Notes: A gravity area that attracts objects parallel to the plane. This one has a cylindrical range.

FishGroupE.Name: Gray Fish Group
FishGroupE.Notes: A group of long, grey fish.

Rabbit.Name: Star Bunny
Rabbit.Notes: A rabbit that be found in several galaxies, including Gold Leaf Galaxy and Freezy Flake Galaxy.

BarrelElectricRailRotateLift.Name: Space Storm -- Rotating Metal Lift
BarrelElectricRailRotateLift.Notes: The rotating metal lift from Space Storm Galaxy's long cylindrical satellite planet.

WaterSphere.Name: Water Area [Sphere]
WaterSphere.Notes: An area that consists of an invisible body of water.

ClipAreaCenterBox.Name: Box-shaped Matter Splatter Hole [Volume Centered]
ClipAreaCenterBox.Notes: A box-shaped Matter Splatter hole. The origin is in the center of the box.

TamakoroMoveGuidanceArea.Name: Star Ball Moving Explanation Area
TamakoroMoveGuidanceArea.Notes: An area which shows the player how to move with the Star Ball while inside it.

BigBubbleMoveLimitterCylinder.Name: Big Bubble Movement Limiter [Cylinder]
BigBubbleMoveLimitterCylinder.Notes: Limits the movement of Big Bubbles so that it moves on the lateral surface of an invisible cylinder.

UFOSandObstacleCEffect.Name: Dusty Dune -- Slim Sand Brick Block Effect
UFOSandObstacleCEffect.Notes: Dust cloud particles that are used for a thin object sinking into or emerging from sand. Primarily meant for use with UFOSandObstacleC.

BeachParasol.Name: Deep Dark -- Beach Parasol
BeachParasol.Notes: An bouncy parasol from Deep Dark Galaxy.

FlipPanelReverse.Name: Gateway Flipswitch Panel
FlipPanelReverse.Notes: A yellow panel that changes to blue if the player steps on it.

VsOtaRockTankIcePlanetFence.Name: Shiverburn -- Prince Pikante Planet Fence
VsOtaRockTankIcePlanetFence.Notes: The fence that surrounds the Prince Pikante planet in Shiverburn Galaxy.

TwoLegsPlanet.Name: Spin Dig -- Digga-Leg Planet
TwoLegsPlanet.Notes: The planet where Digga-Leg is fought in Spin-Dig Galaxy.

MagmaSlicePlanet.Name: Shiverburn -- Rotating Platforms Planet
MagmaSlicePlanet.Notes: The second planet with the many rotating stone platforms from Shiverburn Galaxy's first mission.

TakoSho.Name: Elite Octoomba
TakoSho.Notes: A green version of an Octoomba that spits two rocks instead of one.

BenefitItemOneUp.Name: 1-Up Mushroom
BenefitItemOneUp.Notes: A collectable mushroom that gives an extra life.

GliderDownFallOutWardPlanet.Name: Fleet Glide -- Lower Battleship Planet
GliderDownFallOutWardPlanet.Notes: The battleship planet parts used in Fleet Glide Galaxy.

FirePressure.Name: Fire Ball Shooter
FirePressure.Notes: A red nozzle that shoots balls of fire.

UFOSandObstacleBEffect.Name: Dusty Dune -- Sand Brick Block Effect
UFOSandObstacleBEffect.Notes: Dust cloud particles that are used for a cubic object sinking into or emerging from sand. Primarily meant for use with UFOSandObstacleB.

BothSideWanwanPlanet.Name: Flipsville -- Chomp Planet
BothSideWanwanPlanet.Notes: The Chomp-filled planet used in the first mission of Flipsville Galaxy.

ChallengeBallPlanet.Name: Rolling Gizmo -- Main Planet
ChallengeBallPlanet.Notes: The main planet from Rolling Gizmo Galaxy.

KoopaLv1StartStep.Name: Lava Lair -- Starting Planet
KoopaLv1StartStep.Notes: The planet used at the start of Bowser's Lava Lair.

FollowerDrillDiskPlanetParts.Name: Spin-Dig -- Ring Planet
FollowerDrillDiskPlanetParts.Notes: The ring planet used in the first mission of Spin-Dig Galaxy.

WoodLogBridgeShort.Name: Narrow Wood Bridge
WoodLogBridgeShort.Notes: Creates a suspension bridge consisting of short logs.

PackunPetit.Name: Piranha Plant
PackunPetit.Notes: An iconic plant enemy that tries to bite the player.

PeachCastleTownGate.Name: Peach's Castle: Town Gate
